data.message: MCP Server Composition Patterns: 1) FastMCP import_server() for static one-time copy, mount() for dynamic live delegation. 2) MCP Gateway as reverse proxy/orchestrator for federated architectures. 3) One server per domain recommended (Git server, weather server) to avoid permission creep. 4) Client-side orchestration discovers servers, checks capabilities, routes requests. 5) Tool chaining: Reactive (ReAct step-by-step) vs Proactive (Plan-then-Execute which provides security via control-flow integrity).
